from vpython import sphere, color, vector, curve, rate, arrow, graph, gcurve, mag

# Parameter Settings
G = 6.7E-11
M = 2E30
m = 6E24
d = 1E11
Radius_M = 1E10
Radius_m = 1E9
Radius_I = 1 
h = 5E10
v0 = 0
i = 0
t = 0
dt = 1E4

# Screen Settings
s1 = sphere(pos=vector(d, 0, 0), radius=Radius_M, color=color.red)
s2 = sphere(pos=vector(-d, 0, 0), radius=Radius_M, color=color.red)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, h, 0), radius=Radius_I, color=color.blue, make_trail=True)
line = curve(vector(-d, 0, 0), vector(d, 0, 0))
top = curve(vector(-d, h, 0), vector(d, h, 0))
bottom = curve(vector(-d, -h, 0), vector(d, -h, 0))
v_arrow = arrow(pos=ball.pos, axis=vector(0, v0, 0), shaftwidth=1E9, color=color.green)
a_arrow = arrow(pos=ball.pos, axis=vector(0, 0, 0), shaftwidth=1E9, color=color.yellow)
gd = graph(title='x, v, a - t', xtitle='t', ytitle='blue: x, green: v, yellow: a', fast=False)
x_t = gcurve(graph=gd, color=color.blue)
v_t = gcurve(graph=gd, color=color.green)
a_t = gcurve(graph=gd, color=color.yellow)

# Object Motion
while i < 5:
    rate(1000)
    r1 = ball.pos - s1.pos
    r2 = ball.pos - s2.pos
    F1 = -G * M * m * r1 / mag(r1)**3
    F2 = -G * M * m * r2 / mag(r2)**3
    F_net = F1 + F2
    a = F_net / m
    dv = a * dt
    ball.velocity += dv
    ball.pos += ball.velocity * dt
    if ball.pos.y > h:
        t += dt
        i += 1
        print('i =', i, '  t =', t)
    v_arrow.pos = ball.pos
    v_arrow.axis = ball.velocity
    a_arrow.pos = ball.pos
    a_arrow.axis = a * 1E-10
    x_t.plot(t, ball.pos.y)
    v_t.plot(t, mag(ball.velocity))
    a_t.plot(t, mag(a))

        print('i =', i, '  t =', t)
    v_arrow.pos = ball.pos
    v_arrow.axis = ball.velocity
    a_arrow.pos = ball.pos
    a_arrow.axis = a * 1E-10
    x_t.plot(t, ball.pos.y)
    v_t.plot(t, mag(ball.velocity))
    a_t.plot(t, mag(a))
